title: TheMogMiner: 还要有一个1.8-pre3
author: a20001017
txt_content:
TheMogMiner: We'll release 1.8-pre3 tomorrow morning. It will fix two duplication bugs (tripwire and heads on armorstands) and a worldborder issue.

TheMogMiner: 我们明天早上（北京时间明天中午）会发布1.8-pre3。因为要修复两个物品复制Bug（绊线和盔甲架上的头）和一个世界边境Bug。

replies.author: tyson
replies.txt_content: 估计还要出到四

replies.txt_content:
